SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.connectionLayer.RMI.VirtualRMI

Class VirtualViewRMI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.connectionLayer.RMI.VirtualRMI.VirtualViewRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
HeartBeatInterface, VirtualView, ViewInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class VirtualViewRMI extends Object implements VirtualView
This class is the RMI implementation of the VirtualView interface. It is used to send updates to the client.
See Also:

    • heartBeat

      public void heartBeat()
      Call the checkEmpty method on the client to check if the connection is still alive. If the client does not respond in Configs.secondsTimeOut seconds, it logs an error and close the connection
      Specified by:
      heartBeat in interface HeartBeatInterface
      Specified by:
